data.comment: A total of 4118 spectators is reported.
Today's referee, Nuno Almeida, has blown to start the match.

Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.

Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yves Baraye of Gil Vicente smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
In Barcelos, Gil Vicente push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Can Santa Clara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gil Vicente's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.

Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Gil Vicente have an attacking throw-in.
Gil Vicente's Yves Baraye attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Nuno Almeida awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.

Santa Clara advance rapidly upfield but Nuno Almeida blows for offside.

Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Throw-in high up the field for Gil Vicente in Barcelos.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gil Vicente's Bozhidar Kraev breaks free at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the strike goes wide of the post.

At Estadio Cidade de Barcelos, Lourency for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!

Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Santa Clara.
Henrique Gomes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gil Vicente.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
In Barcelos Gil Vicente attack through Bozhidar Kraev. The finish is off target, however.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Santa Clara drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Fernando Fonseca for Gil Vicente who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Nuno Almeida signals a throw-in for Gil Vicente, close to Santa Clara's area.
Fernando Fonseca is back on the pitch.
Nuno Almeida signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fernando Fonseca.
Gil Vicente's Fernando Fonseca is back in action after a slight knock.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
The first-half has come to a close in Barcelos.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Vitor Manuel Oliveira is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos with Vitor Carvalho replacing Fernando Fonseca.
Lourency of Gil Vicente gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.

Goal! Bozhidar Kraev gives Gil Vicente a 1-0 lead.

Hugo Vieira (Gil Vicente) has replaced the possibly injured Sandro Lima.
Santa Clara push upfield but Nuno Almeida quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Carlos Carvalho is replacing Ze Manuel for the away team.
Salomao is replacing Osama Rashid for Santa Clara at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.

Nuno Almeida waits before resuming play because Denis for Gil Vicente is still down.
Denis has recovered and rejoins the match in Barcelos.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Goal! Thiago Santana (Santa Clara) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Barcelos.
Lincoln with an assist there.

Ruben Ribeiro is on a sub for Yves Baraye for Gil Vicente.

Nogueira is back on his feet again.
